RelationshipElement.name: Box - Box Status
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

RelationshipElement.name: Box - Nest
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

RelationshipElement.name: Nest - Nest Measurement
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

RelationshipElement.name: Nest - Egg
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

RelationshipElement.name: Nest - Chick

RelationshipElement.name: Chick - Chick Measurement
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

property.name: Box Box Prefix
property.formatString: Box-$1

property.name: Height m
property.description: Measure height above ground in metres.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Orientation degrees
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}
